item.title: Harshanu marriage
item.description: In the tapestry of life, where threads of destiny are intricately woven, our love story stands as a testament to the beauty of arranged marriages. In the year 2021, amidst the vibrant landscapes of Gadag, India, our paths converged, and a chapter of love, blessings, and togetherness began. Our union, witnessed by cherished relatives and friends, was more than a celebration of two hearts coming together; it was a fusion of traditions, love, and the promise of a lifetime.
